PlannedShot_TENNO.NAME: Planned Shot
PlannedShot_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a random Skill from your draw pile into your hand.
PlannedShot_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put !M! random Skills from your draw pile into your hand.

Aviator_TENNO.NAME: Aviator
Aviator_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand.
Aviator_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put !M! random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand.

VoidStrike_TENNO.NAME: Void Strike
VoidStrike_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Void into your discard pile.

HeavySlam_TENNO.NAME: Heavy Slam
HeavySlam_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Costs 1 less [E] if the last card played this turn was a Skill.

CleansingStrike_TENNO.NAME: Cleansing Strike
CleansingStrike_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a void from your draw pile or discard pile.
CleansingStrike_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a void from your draw pile and discard pile.

Meditation_TENNO.NAME: Meditation
Meditation_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust a void from your draw pile or discard pile.
Meditation_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust a void from your draw pile and discard pile.

TapDodge_TENNO.NAME: Tap Dodge
TapDodge_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This turn, your next Attack is played twice.

BurstStrike_TENNO.NAME: Burst Strike
BurstStrike_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, your next Skill is played twice.

DailyLogin_TENNO.NAME: Daily Login
DailyLogin_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack and Skill into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

RollingGuard_TENNO.NAME: Rolling Guard
RollingGuard_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Intangible. Retain. Exhaust.

CleavingWhirlwind_TENNO.NAME: Cleaving Whirlwind
CleavingWhirlwind_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If this kills an enemy, return it to your hand.

ExaltedBlade_TENNO.NAME: Exalted Blade
ExaltedBlade_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Add 4 special Attacks to your hand.
ExaltedBlade_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 4 special Attacks to your hand and upgrade them.

EqualLaceration_TENNO.NAME: Equal Laceration
EqualLaceration_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Ethereal. Exhaust.

CuttingPoise_TENNO.NAME: Cutting Poise
CuttingPoise_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage three times. Ethereal. Exhaust.

LancingJustice_TENNO.NAME: Lancing Justice
LancingJustice_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply 1 Weak. Apply 1 Vulnerable. Ethereal. Exhaust.

BlindingSlice_TENNO.NAME: Blinding Slice
BlindingSlice_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The target loses !M! Strength this turn.

UmbralFiber_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Fiber
UmbralFiber_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. Gain !B! Block.

UmbralIntensify_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Intensify
UmbralIntensify_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Your next card this turn is played twice.

UmbralHowl_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Howl
UmbralHowl_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

UmbralForm_TENNO.NAME: Umbral Form
UmbralForm_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an Umbral card into your hand.
UmbralForm_TENNO.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Umbral card into your hand.

GrowingPower_TENNO.NAME: Growing Power
GrowingPower_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain 1 Strength

WildFrenzy_TENNO.NAME: Wild Frenzy
WildFrenzy_TENNO.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your Attacks are played twice. Reduce the cost of Attacks in your hand by 1 this turn.
